person.persName: William S. Allen (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Floyd County, Kentucky, native. Married to Elizabeth Allen. Father of John Allen, Rebecca Allen, Mahala Allen, Reece Allen, Harrison Allen, and Samuel Allen. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Breathitt County in 1864.
